description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Judgment Day has arrived... Global Warming is mounting a full scale invasion to finish off the Polar Bears once and for all. Move the Polar Bears north and help them stave off the uncomfortable feeling of Anti-Life. Nut Bear?
